attributes.action: Bring back the death penalty for terrorisim suspects
attributes.additional_details:
Following the outrage of this weeks events in London. The murder in premeditated cold blooded murder of Fusilier Lee Rigby. Bring back the death penalty for all Terrorism suspect. Once proven guilty through criminal convictions. Suspect should be put to death by Immediate lethal injection without delay. Keeping these people in behind bars for life sentences at public expense is a waste of money.
British Prime Minister David Cameron called the killing “truly shocking” and said he had asked Home Secretary Theresa May to call an urgent meeting of the government’s emergency committee.
